verses.verse: Then Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Go <WH935> in to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and tell <WH1696> him, <WH3068> 'This is what Yahweh, the God <WH430> of the Hebrews, <WH5680> says: <WH559> "Let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve me. <WH5647>
For if you refuse <WH3986> to let them go, <WH7971> and hold them still, <WH2388>

behold, <WH3027> the hand of Yahweh <WH3068> is <WH1961> on your livestock <WH4735> which are in the field, <WH7704> on the horses, <WH5483> on the donkeys, <WH2543> on the camels, <WH1581> on the herds, <WH1241> and on the flocks <WH6629> with a very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> pestilence. <WH1698>

Yahweh <WH3068> will make a distinction <WH6395> between the livestock <WH4735> of Israel <WH3478> and the livestock <WH4735> of Egypt; <WH4714> and nothing <WH1697> shall die <WH4191> of all that belongs to the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>"'"
Yahweh <WH3068> appointed <WH7760> a set time, <WH4150> saying, <WH559> "Tomorrow <WH4279> Yahweh <WH3068> shall do <WH6213> this thing <WH1697> in the land. <WH776>"

Yahweh <WH3068> did <WH6213> that thing <WH1697> on the next day; <WH4283> and all the livestock <WH4735> of Egypt <WH4714> died, <WH4191> but of the livestock <WH4735> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> not one <WH259> died. <WH4191>

Pharaoh <WH6547> sent, <WH7971> and, <WH259> behold, there was not so much as one of the livestock <WH4735> of the Israelites <WH3478> dead. <WH4191> But the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> was stubborn, <WH3513> and he didn't <WH5971> let the people go. <WH7971>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> "Take <WH3947> to you handfuls <WH2651> of ashes <WH6368> of the furnace, <WH3536> and let Moses <WH4872> sprinkle <WH2236> it toward the sky <WH8064> in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh. <WH6547>

It shall become small dust <WH80> over all the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and shall be a boil <WH7822> breaking out <WH6524> with boils <WH76> on man <WH120> and on animal, <WH929> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>"

They took <WH3947> ashes <WH6368> of the furnace, <WH3536> and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> Pharaoh; <WH6547> and Moses <WH4872> sprinkled <WH2236> it up toward the sky; <WH8064> and it became a boil <WH7822> breaking out <WH6524> with boils <WH76> on man <WH120> and on animal. <WH929>

The magicians <WH2748> couldn't <WH3201> stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872> because <WH6440> of the boils; <WH7822> for the boils <WH7822> were on the magicians, <WH2748> and on all the Egyptians. <WH4714>
Yahweh <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and he didn't <WH8085> listen to them, <WH3068> as Yahweh had spoken <WH1696> to Moses. <WH4872>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Rise up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and tell <WH559> him, <WH3068> 'This is what Yahweh, the God <WH430> of the Hebrews, <WH5680> says: <WH559> "Let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve me. <WH5647>

For this time <WH6471> I will send <WH7971> all my plagues <WH4046> against your heart, <WH3820> against your officials, <WH5650> and against your people; <WH5971> that you may know <WH3045> that there is none like me in all the earth. <WH776>

For now I would have stretched out <WH7971> my hand, <WH3027> and struck <WH5221> you and your people <WH5971> with pestilence, <WH1698> and you would have been cut off <WH3582> from the earth; <WH776>
but indeed for this <WH199> cause <WH5668> I have made you stand: <WH5975> to show <WH7200> you my power, <WH3581> and that my name <WH8034> may be declared <WH5608> throughout all the earth; <WH776>
as you still exalt <WH5549> yourself against my people, <WH5971> that you won't <WH7971> let them go.

Behold, <WH4279> tomorrow about this time <WH6256> I will cause it to rain <WH4305> a very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> hail, <WH1259> such as has not been <WH3644> in Egypt <WH4714> since <WH4480> the day it was founded even until now. <WH3117>

Now therefore command <WH7971> that all of your livestock <WH4735> and all that you have in the field <WH7704> be brought <WH5756> into shelter. <WH120> Every man and animal <WH929> that is found <WH4672> in the field, <WH7704> and isn't <WH622> brought home, <WH1004> the hail <WH1259> shall come down <WH3381> on them, <WH4191> and they shall die."'"

Those who feared <WH3373> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> among the servants <WH5650> of Pharaoh <WH6547> made their servants <WH5650> and their livestock <WH4735> flee <WH5127> into the houses. <WH1004>
Whoever didn't <WH7760> respect the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> left <WH5800> his servants <WH5650> and his livestock <WH4735> in the field. <WH7704>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Stretch out <WH5186> your hand <WH3027> toward the sky, <WH8064> that there may be hail <WH1259> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> on man, <WH120> and on animal, <WH929> and on every herb <WH6212> of the field, <WH7704> throughout the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>"

Moses <WH4872> stretched out <WH5186> his rod <WH4294> toward the heavens, <WH8064> and Yahweh <WH3068> sent <WH5414> thunder, <WH6963> hail, <WH1259> and lightning <WH784> flashed down <WH1980> to the earth. <WH776> Yahweh <WH3068> rained <WH4305> hail <WH1259> on the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

So there was very severe hail, <WH1259> and lightning <WH784> mixed <WH8432> with the hail, <WH1259> such <WH3966> as <WH3515> had not been <WH3808> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> since it became a nation. <WH1471>

The hail <WH1259> struck <WH5221> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> all that was in the field, <WH7704> both man <WH120> and animal; <WH929> and the hail <WH1259> struck <WH5221> every herb <WH6212> of the field, <WH7704> and broke <WH7665> every tree <WH6086> of the field. <WH7704>
Only in the land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> where the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were, <WH1259> there was no hail.

Pharaoh <WH6547> sent, <WH7971> and called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> and said <WH559> to them, <WH2398> "I have sinned this time. <WH6471> Yahweh <WH3068> is righteous, <WH6662> and I and my people <WH5971> are wicked. <WH7563>

Pray <WH6279> to Yahweh; <WH3068> for there has been enough <WH7227> of mighty <WH430> thunderings <WH6963> and hail. <WH1259> I will let you go, <WH7971> and you shall stay <WH5975> no longer. <WH3254>"

Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to him, <WH3318> "As soon as I have gone out of the city, <WH5892> I will spread abroad <WH6566> my hands <WH3709> to Yahweh. <WH3068> The thunders <WH6963> shall cease, <WH2308> neither shall there be any more hail; <WH1259> that you may know <WH3045> that the earth <WH776> is Yahweh <WH3068>'s.
But as for you and your servants, <WH5650> I know <WH3045> that you don't <WH3372> yet fear Yahweh <WH3068> God. <WH430>"
The flax <WH6594> and the barley <WH8184> were struck, <WH5221> for the barley <WH8184> was in the ear, <WH24> and the flax <WH6594> was in bloom. <WH1392>
But the wheat <WH2406> and the spelt <WH3698> were not struck, <WH5221> for they <WH2007> had not grown up. <WH648>

Moses <WH4872> went out <WH3318> of the city <WH5892> from Pharaoh, <WH6547> and spread abroad <WH6566> his hands <WH3709> to Yahweh; <WH3068> and the thunders <WH6963> and hail <WH1259> ceased, <WH2308> and the rain <WH4306> was not poured <WH5413> on the earth. <WH776>

When Pharaoh <WH6547> saw <WH7200> that the rain <WH4306> and the hail <WH1259> and the thunders <WH6963> were ceased, <WH2308> he sinned <WH2398> yet more, <WH3254> and hardened <WH3513> his heart, <WH3820> he and his servants. <WH5650>

The heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> was hardened, <WH2388> and he didn't <WH1121> let the children of Israel <WH3478> go, <WH7971> just as Yahweh <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> through <WH3027> Moses. <WH4872>
